items.sentence: Tom filled his and Mary's canteens with water.
It's a good thing that Tom left the door open.
Tom keep his doors locked while he's sleeping.
This amusement park is due to open in October.
Maybe you need to do the same thing I'm doing.
It took me longer to get here than I expected.
I just wanted to be your friend, nothing more.
As soon as you're done, why don't you go home?
Tom left the theater before the play was over.
It's not your fault. It's not anybody's fault.
Let's take a moment to appreciate the scenery.
Do you think that it would be good to do that?
I think that it was Tom who wanted to do that.
How do you think that Tom was able to do that?
Do you think that Tom will be able to do that?
Don't you think that you could do that for me?
Tom used to swim every day for thirty minutes.
Tom died without telling his secret to anyone.
Tom got into a fight with Mary because of you.
Tom was at the airport when the bomb exploded.
